motions.title: Gym and men's room mirror replacement
motions.description: Bid from Miner for $4,626.48 for replacement of 2 mirrors in the gym and 1 mirror in the men's room.

motions.title: Amendment to the fine policy
motions.description: Approve the proposed revisions to the fine policy which add all types of vehicle violations to the escalated fine schedule.

motions.title: Flag purchase & committee action for July 4th
motions.description: Approve the purchase of 20 outdoor rated American flags and materials for flagpoles for $566.40.

motions.title: Clubhouse TV screen replacement
motions.description: Approve the purchase of (1) 75inch TV screen and a carousel content manager from NorVision for a cost not to exceed $3,000.

motions.title: Fitness center maintenance bid
motions.description: Approve the bid from Gym Tech for $1,684.14 for maintenance items needed in the fitness center.
